nodes.text: Keres II was a frozen planet in the Empress Teta system of the Deep Core. It orbited the star Koros, but had no moons orbiting it. The planet contained a number of carbonite deposits which a mining outpost was set up to exploit. In around the year 3643 BBY however the miners working in the outpost suddenly abandoned the planet without explanation, allowing scavengers to move in and claim the deposits.

Keres II was first mentioned in the second installment of Byss and the Deep Core a series of supplements written by Rodney Thompson for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game and released on the Wizards of the Coast website in 2005. It was then mentioned as part of the scavenging crew skills mission "The Carbonite Mines" in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
